name: Corona Killer (ROTxBLAU)
description:
Once there were peacefull times in a prosper civilisation. Now there is only fear.

We need heros who stand against our anxieties...

BECOME THIS HERO! BECOME CORONA KILLER!

YOUR DESTINY: RESCUE - US - ALL!!!

And withstand the pandemic of father-mother Covid-19 and their mutations over 9999 days!

Corona Killer is a "Astroids"-Clone combined with awareness-elements inspired from the worldwide Covid-19 pandemic. You are a unknown hero, who fights with his small green water-gun and fresh water. During the game you will meet several people which are trying to overcome the shutdown. Your target is to protect all fellow human beings from the invading virusses.

produced 2020, by KLATSCH´n Prod. & ROTxBLAU
